short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gathers what you want to miu on the web on a single page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gathers what you want to keep an eye on, in real time, in a single page, only one click away from what you are doing.

It does not work with sites rejecting external requests, like :
- google
- amazon
- facebook
however it works a majority of websites.

User Data Privacy :
The collected data remains on your own computer, in chrome's secure storage. The collected data only includes which sites you keep an eye on and which part of the website you see.

latest version added :
- open webmiu in a tab (very useful for slow connections and intensive users ;) )

1.4 added :
- you can now arrange the tiles as you wish !
